page.title: 03THE CASTLE AND THE GHOST
page.content: The castle and grounds are open to visitors from{Easter}until the end of{ {September.}The numbers visiting have increased steadily since the public was first admitted in{1952.}The increase can be seen by looking at the following table:- {YEAR VISITORS { }1980 33000 1981 55786 1982 65685 1983 74486 1984 71373 Most in-season visitors come to see the beautiful formal gardens, the rich furnishings of the castle and, of course, hoping to catch a glimpse of the castle ghost _ the{Green Lady}_ last seen in{1980.} A further{20000}visitors arrive during the winter months to enjoy the peace of a quiet country walk.
